    • Uses of Block in be.ac.ulb.crashcoin.common

      Methods in be.ac.ulb.crashcoin.common that return Block 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected static Block BlockChain.createGenesisBlock()
      Create a block designed to be the first block of the blockchain and returns it.
      Block BlockChain.getLastBlock() 
      Methods in be.ac.ulb.crashcoin.common with parameters of type Block 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean BlockChain.add(Block block)
      Verifies the block, add it to the end of the blockChain if it is valid and update the set of transactions available as inputs.
      protected Transaction BlockChain.getFirstBadTransaction(Block block)
      Gets the first bad transaction that it finds in a block, otherwise returns null.
      protected boolean BlockChain.isValidNextBlock(Block block, int difficulty)
      Performs checks one the given block and returns whether it may be appended to the Blockchain
